resources.string: Click me to turn my services on!
Click me to turn my services off!

Ever had your phone ring loudly in the middle of a meeting? Profile Chameleon saves you a ton of embarrassment by turning your phone silent automagically when there is an event in progress! 

 Profile Chameleon monitors your calendars and keeps track of all your events. 

 Need only your work calendar to be monitored? Profile Chameleon has you covered! You can select all your calendars, or only specific calendars based on your needs.
